thread.title: Assured Guaranty Ltd. Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.16 per Common Share

author: cnbc.com
title: Assured Guaranty Ltd. Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.16 per Common Share
text:
HAMILTON, Bermuda--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Assured Guaranty Ltd. (NYSE:AGO) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.16 per common share. The dividend is payable on May 30, 2018 to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 16, 2018.
Assured Guaranty Ltd. is a publicly traded Bermuda-based holding company. Its operating subsidiaries provide credit enhancement products to the U.S. and international public finance, infrastructure and structured finance markets. More information on Assured Guaranty and its subsidiaries can be found at AssuredGuaranty.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180502005706/en/
Assured Guaranty Ltd.
